name: MyMovieRoom
0:
”Alexa, open my movie room”
”Alexa, start my movie room”
”Alexa, launch my movie room”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my movie room
des:
You can listen to an overview of any movie. After opening by just say "tell me about " and then followed by any movie name like Ex. Titanic. You can also tell Alexa only the movie name too. 
Some other Examples 
"give me details about <Movie Name>"
"brief <Movie Name>"
"give me an overview of <Movie Name>"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
